content:
That's a great plan! 🤩 You're covering all the bases to encourage engagement and make it easy for your audience to participate. By using a combination of Instagram posts, stories, and the "Question" sticker, you'll be able to reach a wider audience and make it easy for them to respond.

Remember to:

* Keep your guidelines clear and concise
* Make it easy for your audience to submit their content (e.g., by using a branded hashtag or a specific email address)
* Respond to submissions and engage with your audience
* Feature a variety of content to keep things fresh and interesting
* Follow up with your audience and thank them for participating

By doing so, you'll create a sense of community and encourage more people to participate. Don't forget to track your analytics to see how your engagement rates and audience growth are affected by this campaign.

Most importantly, have fun and be authentic! 🎉 Your audience will appreciate your efforts to engage with them and create a sense of community.

If you need any more help or have any questions, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Good luck with your campaign, and I hope it's a huge success! 🤞
